Pre-Game Insights: Moldova will face Malta at the Stadionul Zimbru on Saturday in the opening game of their 2024-25 UEFA Nations League campaign.
Moldova was thrashed 4-0 by Ukraine in their most recent outing, conceding twice in either half as they fell to their heaviest defeat since 2022.

Malta was beaten 2-0 by Greece in their last match, conceding both goals in the opening 15 minutes and failing to offer a response in an overall disappointing performance at the Untersberg-Arena in Austria.
Moldova has lost just one of their last six games on home soil and will be hopeful of a positive result this weekend.
Malta is on a run of consecutive defeats and is without a win in their last eight games across all competitions.
